name: Semi Truck Zombie Crusher
description:
SemiTruck Zombie Crusher is an intense action racing game which pits your driving skills against Zombies desperate to take you down.

Crash and bash through smash-able scenery in this Semi Truck,

*****Features*****
*****Stunning 3D graphics.
*****Cool sound effects.
*****Large, beautiful, scenes to drive through.
***** Physics based chaos and mayhem.
*****Ground-breaking, easy to use driving controls.
